alert.note: Alert for Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 11:46AM AKDT until October 24 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Additional snow accumulations one to two inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. South winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and snow will diminish late this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
